channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:36 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 00:36 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages. #Khmelnytskyi_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
